comments:
In an IBM internal product based on WTP, a tester was trying to add a main class to the manifest.mf of an application client project. The manifest.mf editor failed with the following WTP exception thrown in the .log. Please let me know directly if you'd like to see the full stack trace.

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.lang.String.compareTo(String.java:410)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.application.internal.operations.ClassPathSelection$1.compare
(ClassPathSelection.java:72)
	at java.util.Arrays.mergeSort(Arrays.java:1292)
	at java.util.Arrays.sort(Arrays.java:1233)
	at java.util.Collections.sort(Collections.java:169)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.application.internal.operations.ClassPathSelection.initializ
eElements(ClassPathSelection.java:333)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.application.internal.operations.ClassPathSelection.<init>(Cl
assPathSelection.java:91)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.ClasspathModel.createClassPathSelection(Clas
spathModel.java:230)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.ClasspathModel.initializeSelection(Classpath
Model.java:210)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.ClasspathModel.getClassPathSelection(Classpa
thModel.java:256)
	at [editted].ClasspathTableManager.initializeEJBClient
Defaults(ClasspathTableManager.java:81)
This is not reproducable with RC1.
Added to Hot List at the request of Tim deBoer and set priority to P2.
